thread.title_full: AsianDate Welcomes All Singles to Join a Special ChatFest Celebrating China???s Mid-Autumn Festival

title: AsianDate Welcomes All Singles to Join a Special ChatFest Celebrating China???s Mid-Autumn Festival
text: AsianDate Welcomes All Singles to Join a Special ChatFest Celebrating Chinas Mid-Autumn Festival September 24, 2015 -- AsianDate announces the hosting of an action-packed ChatFest to spread the joy among members for Chinas Mid-Autumn festival. AsianDate, a leading online dating service trusted by singles worldwide, has announced details of a special ChatFest to celebrate one of Asias most important festivals. The event will spread the joy of Chinas popular Mid-Autumn festival among singles looking for love and friendship. The ChatFest will take place from September 25-27 and is expected to create a real buzz among inquisitive members worldwide. AsianDate makes it a priority to spread awareness about the diverse cultures, traditions and festivals observed in various Asian countries. Members from other parts of the world looking for Asian partners and companions benefit from these events as they get to learn all about the festivals and occasions celebrated by Asians. Chinas Mid-Autumn festival takes place during the full moon and is an important part of the harvest festival. It falls on the 15 th day of the eighth month of the Han calendar. Lanterns, fireworks and moon cakes are strong symbols of this festival. The idea behind the ChatFest is to bring members from across the world together on the same platform as those from China and Vietnam. The website encourages all members to learn and share details about the various events, festivals, cultures and traditions of their own country and others as well. AsianDate offers numerous features and communication tools to help members connect with each other. One of the most commonly used facilities popular among members is Chat. It helps members communicate with their online dating partners seamlessly, effectively and in real time. The Chat feature is available to all registered members. They simply have to log on to their AnastasiaDate account and click on the Chat tab to set up a chat with Chinese and Vietnamese partners who are online. A phone translation service is also available from AsianDate for those who want to hear their Chinese or Vietnamese match talk about the festival on the phone. For more information, visit www.AsianDate.com About AsianDate: AsianDate is part of the Anastasia Family, founded in 1993, which offers premium international dating to facilitate exciting and romantic companionship online between men and women all over the world. The Anastasia Family includes AsianDate.com, AnastasiaDate.com, AmoLatina.com, ArabianDate.com and AfricaBeauties.com, which bring together over 20 million international users and more than 150 million online visitors annually. Additionally, over 2.5 million conversations are exchanged onsite daily. AsianDate is committed to member safety, customer satisfaction and the ongoing pursuit of innovation. Headquartered in New York, the Anastasia Family has additional representation in every country it touches providing a high level of customer service to a worldwide clientele. All members are able to communicate across a variety of top-notch multimedia platforms, including video chat and a mobile app for Android devices available in Google Play. Media Contact
